sys_remote_update_set.description:
Jason and Hardik,
The email in this thread was sent to the end user including a link to veriskdev instead of to production. Can we get this fixed ASAP?
--gerald
Gerald Hanks | Manager Network Operations Verisk Analytics - Information Technology Phone: +1.801.932.8784 | Mobile: +1.801.753.8521
From: "Cheah, Chee-Chong (Jacky)" <Chee-Chong.Cheah@verisk.com> Date: Friday, June 9, 2017 at 2:20 PM To: Gerald Hanks <glhanks@verisk.com> Subject: FW: Time to request firewall rules for 0978-INTRA-P01
Thank You.
Chee Chong Cheah (Jacky) | Developer Verisk Insurance Solutions - ISO Solutions Phone: +1.201.469.2853 x 2853
From: Verisk Service Management [mailto:verisk@service-now.com] Sent: Friday, June 09, 2017 10:23 AM To: Cheah, Chee-Chong (Jacky) Subject: Time to request firewall rules for 0978-INTRA-P01
Please use the link below to request firewall rules if needed for your server 0978-INTRA-P01 with IP address 172.16.91.82
Click Here
Ref:MSG5823461
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - Fix email address for Firewall Request in New Virtual Server workflow
